attributes.additional_details: Tougher laws needed for Animal Cruelty.  Poor Kaylee was found wandering the streets and then handed into a Rescue who then nursed her back to health but unfortunately poor Kaylee was too poorly to recover and she had to be put to sleep on the 14th of Sept 2014.  No one has been proscuted for this as yet.  Please help us protect these animals who cannot protect themselves.
